title: new patch 6.24
body: how many mb for the new patch?, because it showing / 84.2 mb but it more than 500mb already.

replies.body:
With the new client, it's a bit harder to tell how many MB the patch is exactly, but I didn't see a huge increase. Also keep in mind that some of the amount of data listed are simply amount of data the client has to **scan** but not necessarily download.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
